result.arabic_text: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا
result.translation: 7. Nanu diggah baaxô bagul eneyyi ittam baaxoh bila abneeh teetil yan marah tuxxiq abne, mcqc taamah keenik yayse maraa kee uma taamah keenik gaca mara keenik mokkorraah naaxigemkeh.
